ygData.subject: RE: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I looted from a champion (with permission of course) who was killed by another group, over in the long corridor leading to the Fire King s room. I never
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2000 10:40 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent bits and pieces
>
>
> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
> I am pretty sure that I got mine in the "bar room" in Sol-A.
> We were there
> about 4 hours and I got both items. We had some mid 30's
> rangers with us
> lower 30's. When my regular group tried to break the room at
> levels 24 thru
> 28 group, we got spanked. If you can recruit some mid 30's
> types you should
> do pretty well.
>
> Sylly
>
> > From: Melaniel <everquest@...>
> >
>
> > Can anyone gimme a few hints about where and how tough the Solusek
> > Mage and the Solusek Champion are. An opinion of how frequent the
> > spawn and drops are would be helpful too ;-)

I looted from a champion (with permission of course) who was killed by
another group, over in the long corridor leading to the Fire King's room. I
never saw any of these guys at the bar room.

FYI, I died a lot here at my current level 28 just trying to get to places.
The shamans and wizards see invis and cast see invis on other mobs (I'm sure
this has been mentioned before on this list, but it was a while back). I'm
hoping at level 29 they won't aggro on me anymore, but not sure. I'm sure
they don't aggro on level 30's. Too bad, seems like such a good place for
exp and items at my level, but I can't make it to any of the good rooms. So
you'll have to con everything and see if something is not indifferent to
you. Anything not indifferent will jump you.

Windleaf Mistsong
28th level balladeer
Bertox
